mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT po.`startdate`,po.`enddate`,po.confirm_status as confirmStatus,po.`confirm_img` AS confirmImg ,po.`pname`,SUM(pod.`peoplecnt`) AS peoplecnt,SUM(pod.`unit_price`) AS unitPrice,SUM(pod.`amount`) AS amount, ro.`order_no` as orderNo,pod.`pid`,po.`runing_no` as runingNo,po.`payImg` FROM route_order ro LEFT JOIN product_order po ON ro.`order_no` = po.`order_no` LEFT JOIN product_order_detail pod ON po.`pid`=pod.`pid` AND pod.`order_no`=ro.`order_no` AND pod.`runing_no`=po.`runing_no` where ro.`order_no`=#{orderNo} GROUP BY po.`runing_no`

SELECT po.`order_no` as orderNo,pod.`price_item` as priceItem,po.`pid`,po.`ptype`,pod.`peoplecnt`, pod.`unit_price` as unitPrice ,pod.`amount`,po.`runing_no` as runingNo,pod.`ordercnt`,rt.`room_type_name` FROM product_order po LEFT JOIN product_order_detail pod ON po.`pid` = pod.`pid` AND po.`order_no` = pod.`order_no` AND po.`runing_no`=pod.`runing_no` LEFT JOIN room_price rp ON rp.`pid`=po.`pid` AND pod.`priceItemId`=rp.`id` LEFT JOIN room_type rt ON rp.`room_type` = rt.`room_type` AND rt.`pid` = #{pid} WHERE po.`order_no`=#{orderNo} AND po.`pid`=#{pid} and po.runing_no=#{runingNo}
